Package com.screenprog.application.controller

Class AdminController

java.lang.Object
com.screenprog.application.controller.AdminController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/admin") @CrossOrigin(origins="http://127.0.0.1:5500") public class AdminController extends Object
Controller for admin, this controller is only accessible by admin. Login is accessible by everyone

November, 2024
Author:
Asim Ansari
